text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …Excuse me, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You look like you're on edge. What's wrong?
If you're a sprinter, this is the pinnacle stage that everyone dreams of standing on, at least once. This is a race I really want her to win.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, I'll win it. Because I'm the class president.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Besides, we've got to get back on track from here on out!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm a little off the Bakushin Road that I started out on…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: With my overwhelming speed, I'll win this Sprinters Stakes in a world record!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Then, we'll head to the Tenno Sho and Arima Kinen, as originally planned!
…She wants to call it quits on short distances, once and for all.
But I'd love to see her run next year, when she'll be even faster than she is now. How to convince her…… Ah, over there.
(Knock, knock)
Um, is it okay if I come in now…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Certainly, go right ahead! We'll take you any time at all!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Hello, Ms. Bakushin O.
Nishino Flower. A sprinter who debuted at the same time as Sakura Bakushin O. She's a talented Uma who is rapidly making a name for herself.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya, Ms. Nishino Flower! Welcome to the class president's humble abode!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What can I do for you? You can count on me for anything at all―and don't hold back!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Huh? No, I just wanted to say hello to you…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is it about today's race? If so, ask me anything!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll give advice to my rivals, because I'm an honor student!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Uuuh… um, I'm glad to hear you're doing well!
Her meek demeanor belies the fact that she has great speed. She'll be Bakushin's biggest rival in today's race.
Competing against Nishino Flower will surely be an inspiration for Sakura Bakushin O. I can't wait to see it!
choice_data_list: Do your best today, both of you.
Do your best today, both of you.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's get to it! For the sake of going down the Bakushin Road…!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Bakushin Road? …What is that?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's the path the class president will take!!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: …? Is, is that… so?
…I'm looking forward to this!
